QuestData.Title: Fresh Needle Scent
QuestData.Description: Say, if you really are here to help, I could use me some needles off them sprites in Pranksters' Hollow.$b$bThe grummles don't believe in luck they can't smell. They'll pay better for yaks that have that fresh needle scent.
QuestData.CompletionText: Mmm. Nothing like the fresh scent of needle.
QuestData.RewardText: You just earned me a handsome bonus. Getting those needles is a pain in the paw but worth it when we take our yaks to market. Here, for your troubles.
